# Core Rule 9 - Do not share or use multiple accounts Using or creating multiple accounts is prohibited and will result in bans for all accounts.
Sharing accounts with other players is prohibited, and you are responsible for any actions caused by others using your account.
## Switching accounts You may change usernames at https://central.spacestation.io/web/Identity/Account/Manage
If you lose access to or abandon an account, you must notify admins of your old username at https://forum.spacestation14.com/c/general/4 before creating another account.
